elements.title: Hajj: Journey to the Heart of Islam (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that the British Museum's 2012 exhibition Hajj: Journey to the Heart of Islam included textiles from the Kaaba (example pictured) that were described as bringing "a visceral artistic buzz to the display"?

elements.title: Jack Smith (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that Jack Smith, the special counsel appointed to investigate Donald Trump, played football for Liverpool?

elements.title: Paleoserenomyces allenbyensis (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that the parasitic fossil fungus Paleoserenomyces allenbyensis was named after a Canadian ghost town?

elements.title: Mochamad Hasbi (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that retired Indonesian general and politician Mochamad Hasbi fled from arrest for seven years after he was sentenced to a year in prison in relation to a corruption case?

elements.title: Pentapus (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that the Apple II game Pentapus was developed by Jeremy Sagan, son of astronomer Carl Sagan?

elements.title: Canadian Coalition for Firearm Rights (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that the Canadian Coalition for Firearm Rights has been described as "Canada's most prominent pro-gun group"?

elements.title: South Asian river dolphin (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that the South Asian river dolphin is nearly blind and relies on echolocation for navigation?

elements.title: Cow Hell Swamp (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that Cow Hell Swamp got its name because cows would frequently wander in and get stuck?
